testcase.name: Validate common scenarios for subtraction via get call
Validate subtraction with two int values (happy path)
testcase.system-out:
* def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performSubtract = function(op1,op2){return op1 - op2} ............... passed * def baseUrlCompute = baseUrl + '/compute' ............................... passed * def payLoad = {} ........................................................ passed * payLoad.operation = "sub" ............................................... passed * call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaPost.feature') {payLoadReq:#(payLoad)} . failed
Stack Trace: com.intuit.karate.exception.KarateException: ValidateSubtractionPOSTAPI.feature:14 - [3.1:62] CommonValidationsViaPost.feature:48 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 22, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/compute, response: {"result":-1} [4.1:79] CommonValidationsViaPost.feature:74 - status code was: 200, expected: 400, response time: 12, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/compute, response: {"result":-1} [4.3:81] CommonValidationsViaPost.feature:74 - status code was: 200, expected: 400, response time: 4, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/compute, response: {"result":0} CommonValidationsViaPost.feature:93 - status code was: 200, expected: 404, response time: 9, url: http://localhost:8080/qa_testCalc_java11/restWS/compute, response: {"result":-4} at ✽.* call read('classpath:features/commons/CommonValidationsViaPost.feature') {payLoadReq:#(payLoad)} (ValidateSubtractionPOSTAPI.feature:14)
* def testDataInput = read('classpath:'+'resources/InputTestData.json') ... passed * def performSubtract = function(op1,op2){return op1 - op2} ............... passed * def baseUrlCompute = baseUrl + '/compute' ............................... passed * def payLoad = {} ........................................................ passed * payLoad.operation = "sub" ............................................... passed Given url baseUrlCompute .................................................. passed And payLoad.val1 = testDataInput[0].operand1 .............................. passed And payLoad.val2 = testDataInput[0].operand2 .............................. passed * print payLoad ........................................................... passed And request payLoad ....................................................... passed When method post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match $.result == performSubtract(testDataInput[0].operand1,testDataInput[0].operand2) . passed
